info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 08 at 8:53AM CDT until June 08 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 AM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL OKLAHOMA...NORTHWESTERN CLEVELAND AND NORTHWESTERN MCCLAIN COUNTIES... At 852 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over western Norman, or 7 miles north of Goldsby, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported golf ball size hail in northwest Norman. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southern Oklahoma City, Norman, Moore, Newcastle, Goldsby, Stanley Draper Lake, Tinker Air Force Base and western Lake Thunderbird. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
